participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Sophia is a vibrant and creative individual with a passion for fashion and luxury items. She is determined to pursue her interests despite familial opposition.
participant_1.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: James is a reflective and resilient person who has faced numerous challenges in life. He is open about his struggles and values honesty in his interactions.
participant_2.background: i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city. i'm a recovering alcoholic. i am a 45 year old male.
